text: Kwathiwa: “Hini na Nûh! Phuma (enqanaweni) ngoxolo oluvela kuThi, iintsikelelo mazibe phezu kwakho, naphezu kwabantu abakunye nawe, kodwa (kuza kuhamba- kuhambe kubekho) abantu eSiya kubanika oovimba babo (okwethutyana), kodwa ekugqibeleni, isohlwayo esibuhlungu siya kubafumana, sivela kuThi.”
